title: Jason Riley, The Black Boom
description:
Wall Street Journal columnist Jason Riley argues that the policies during the Trump administration improved the economic lives of black people. He's interviewed by Trump Administration former Acting Chairman of the Council on Economic Advisers Tomas Philipson.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
